rule.name: dynamic_ButtonWidget
rule.definition: = load( local!buttonWidget_label: "label", local!buttonWidget_style: "NORMAL", local!buttonWidget_confirmMessage: "confirm message", local!buttonWidget_disabled: { 2 }, local!buttonWidget_value: "value", with( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayoutColumns"( label: "Dynamic Sail Component", columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Label", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Label value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!buttonWidget_label, saveInto: local!buttonWidget_label ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Style", instructions: "Enter 'NORMAL' , 'PRIMARY' , 'DESTRUCTIVE' for the dynamic Style value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!buttonWidget_style, saveInto: local!buttonWidget_style ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Confirm Message", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic ConfirmMessage value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!buttonWidget_confirmMessage, saveInto: local!buttonWidget_confirmMessage ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"( label: "Disabled", instructions: "Checked=true, Unchecked=false", required: false, disabled: false, choiceLabels: { "True", "False" }, value: local!buttonWidget_disabled, saveInto: local!buttonWidget_disabled ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Value", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Value value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!buttonWidget_value, saveInto: local!buttonWidget_value ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"( buttons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"( label: local!buttonWidget_label, style: local!buttonWidget_style, confirmMessage: local!buttonWidget_confirmMessage, disabled: if( local!buttonWidget_disabled = 1, "true", "false" ), value: local!buttonWidget_value, saveInto: local!buttonWidget_value ) } ) } ) } ) ) )
